title: VCMI hero format
description: Format used to define new heroes in VCMI

special.description: If set to true hero will be unavailable on start and won't appear in taverns (campaign heroes)

class.description: Identifier of class this hero belongs to. Such as knight or battleMage

female.description: Set to true if the hero is female by default (can be changed in map editor)

battleImage.description: Custom animation to be used on battle, overrides hero class property

large.description: Large version of portrait for use in hero screen

small.description: Small version of portrait for use on adventure map

specialtyLarge.description: Large image of hero specilty, used in hero screen

specialtySmall.description: Small image of hero specialty for use in exchange screen

army.description: Initial hero army when recruited in tavern

skills.description: List of skills initially known by hero

specialty.description: Description of hero specialty using bonus system

base.description: Section that will be added into every bonus instance, for use in specialties with multiple similar bonuses.

bonuses.description: List of bonuses added by this specialty. See bonus format for more details

creature.description: Shortcut for defining creature specialty, using standard H3 rules.

spellbook.description: List of starting spells, if available. This entry (even empty) will also grant spellbook

texts.description: All translatable texts related to hero

description.description: Description visible when hovering over specialty icon

index.description: Private field to break things, do not use.

onlyOnWaterMap.description: If set to true, hero won't show up on a map with water

onlyOnMapWithoutWater.description: If set to true, hero will show up only if the map contains no water
